short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight text, links, and images across tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MultiFind is a search enhancement tool that allows you to look for words/phrases, images, and links. It also has a bulk import tool to allow you to monitor multiple elements simultaneously. This tool works across web pages and passively.
